title: Remove Admin control from site header

requirements.summary: Remove the Admin button/control from the responsive site header (desktop and mobile) without changing any other header behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as an admin on the home route, the header does not display any "Admin" button/control on desktop.
When logged in as an admin on the home route, the mobile sheet menu does not display any "Admin" button/control.
All other existing header actions remain unchanged: navigation links, Contact Us dropdown, My Bookings button, My Profile control, Login/Logout behavior.
No backend changes are required; the /admin/notifications route and existing access control remain intact.

file_operations.description: Remove the AdminNotificationsControl import and rendering blocks from both the desktop header actions and the mobile sheet menu; also remove any now-unused admin-role query/imports so the header no longer shows an "Admin" control for any user while keeping all other header content, layout, and behaviors unchanged.
